Hi,

sions, but i don't find kind of module

could u share your code for testing=

--- In archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com, Christian Krumm <sign=
ore.chrissi@...> wrote:
>
> Hi,
> 
> I got the extraction of linktext, link=
title and linkenvironment of an
> HTML-Anchor implemented useing a custom J=
erichoExtractorHTML and a
> custom LinkContext. I had to update the version=
 of Jericho manually by
> patching the pom.xml because there has been a lot=
 of OOME using the 2.3
> version, heritrix currently uses. When using the 2=
.6 version of Jericho
> the OOMEs disapered. If I've finished my diploma th=
esis I may provide
> the code as contrib to heritrix2, if someone is intere=
ssted. Please let
> me know if this is the case and what whould be best pra=
ctice to
> contribute it to the heritrix2 codebase.
> 
> Christian
>
